title: 3 and Out - Coughlin Had To Go; Dabo/Clemson Is Carroll/USC 2.0; Full Week 16 Preview ATS; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Coughlin Had To Go; Dabo/Clemson Is Carroll/USC 2.0; Full Week 16 Preview ATS; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff discusses the firing of Tom Coughlin for over-fining players, why the Jags had to let him go, why Dabo Swinney building Clemson into a recruiting juggernaut is reminiscent of Pete Carroll's run at USC, He also previews all the Week 16 games and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
